org.keycloak.models.cache

Interface CachedUserModel

  • All Superinterfaces:
    RoleMapperModel, UserModel
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserAdapter

    public interface CachedUserModel
extends UserModel
    Cached users will implement this interface
    Version:
    $Revision: 1 $
    Author:
    Bill Burke
